overview: October 16, 2014, Audio Club: an unforgettable day for Lucas Silveira, Gustavo Mantovani, Mário Camelo, Thiago Guerra and for all Fresno fans. The group played hits like "Alguém Que te Faz Sorrir", "Desde Quando Você Se Foi" and "Quebre as Correntes", a song that enshrined the group in 2006. It was with the song "Diga, Parte 2", from the album "Infinito" ", that Lucas Silveira's voice was drowned out by the strident chorus of the audience. More mature in their compositions, but without leaving behind the romanticized essence, the gaúchos presented the song "Acordar", present in this new album, "Fresno: 15 Anos ao Vivo".
title: Fresno: 15 Anos - ao Vivo
